tip_0: Avoid extended fights because his Gatling gun will tear your armor.
tip_1: His Valkyrie can be interrupted mid-flight by knock-ups (e.g. Alistar's Pulverize) and displacements (e.g. Alistar's Headbutt)
tip_2: Stop him from backing in lane will immensely help you because Corki's abilities cost a LOT of mana.
